page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart u html text method
page.description: The html text method is used to draw text on the chart.

property.name: position
property.description: The position of the text. See *[link:A5.u.html.notation]* "position" argument.

property.name: layoutSettings
property.description: The layout settings of the text. See *[link:A5.u.html.notation]* "settings" argument.

property.name: drawSettings
property.description: The draw settings for the text. This is a very limited subset of the *[link:A5.chart Definition Label Object]*, though a full label definition can be passed in.

property.name: axis
property.description: In "polar" and "radial" charts, the offset relative to the center of the chart.

property.name: major
property.description: The major offset relative to the axis. The default value is 0.

property.name: minor
property.description: The minor offset relative to the axis. The default value is 0.

property.name: outline
property.description: If true then the text will be outlined to make it more readable over unknown backgrounds.

property.name: color
property.description: The color of the text element. A value of "default" will use the palette default text color. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the class name.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to add to the text element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the class name.

property.name: style
property.description: The CSS style to add to the text element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the style.

property.name: attrs
property.description: The attributes to add to the text element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the attributes.

property.name: tip
property.description: The mouseover tip to add to the text element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the tip.

property.name: pointerEvents
property.description: If true (the default) then pointer events will be allowed. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the tip.

property.name: data
property.description: The chart data. See *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*.
